query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'employees' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user RrKkPPQnXVm5Rho.2d4039ed4870 --database 2Cfui6dKDoaQSG5hbwXu6R --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'employees' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE
id	int
name	varchar
email	varchar
phone	varchar
specialization	enum
userId	int
hireDate	date
salary	decimal
workType	enum
status	enum
createdAt	timestamp
updatedAt	timestamp
profileImage	text
nationalId	varchar
employeeCode	varchar
